channel.title: Bone pointing
channel.description:
does any one know about this australian aboriginal way to kill a person with out a trace nor touching them?
doing bit of a research on it be good if some one can help me if they know anything on it. thx
p.s: i'm not trying to kill anyone a research for history

item.title: Bone pointing
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

actually i did research on it there was this story where a young man though he was bone pointed and he was very ill he couldn’t sollow

his food (when doctoers exaimned him they couldn’t find nothing wrong with him) he was dying day by day then the doctoers contacted

the person from the tribe which the young man belive to be bone pointed by and the person who is a she visited the youngman in the

hospital and told that is was just a joke he’ve never been bone pointed and in couple of hours the young man was normal and healty) its

belived that aboriginals belive in their tribes black magic very much which can cause a mental pain and can kill you. also the bone

pointing the object used is a kangaroo or human bone them it was to get the victoms hair and tie it to the bone and with a few ancient

spells it was complete) the bone pointing is done by just pointing a bone to the victom and saying simple magic sowrd and in shock just

seeing the bone the victem is paralized in his own fear.

made it like that so easier to read

Read full topic

item.title: Bone pointing
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:9, topic:32564”]Well you get a guy and his daughter… you tell the guy to drown himself or your going to have a wild party with his daughter after thats done and he still did not do it you tell him you will kill her if he does not do it kill her… then get his wife and do again if he still does not do it well your screwed.

BTW how the hell do you kill someone with your mind…[/quote]
Haha that made me laugh. I don’t know either, but that’s how they did it. I’m almost positive.

Read full topic

item.title: Bone pointing
item.dc:creator: @Cheatest Cheatest
item.description:
@Cheatest wrote:

Well you get a guy and his daughter… you tell the guy to drown himself or your going to have a wild party with his daughter after thats done and he still did not do it you tell him you will kill her if he does not do it kill her… then get his wife and do again if he still does not do it well your screwed.

BTW how the hell do you kill someone with your mind…

Read full topic

item.title: Bone pointing
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

Hex Key:

You sure came to the right place to lean about aboriginal murder methods…

Well i was horribley wrong, it seems there is a wealth of knowledge ofaboriginal mind tricks in this community.

item.title: Bone pointing
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Yes, the aborigines used their mind to kill someone. I’m almost sure the rule was if they killed someone in their tribe they would be slaughtered. I’m Australian so I kind of know a bit about it, and a couple of weeks ago we had like an aborigine display at our school. I vaguely remember someone telling me that they could use their minds. I asked if they could demonstrate on each other

Read full topic

i know a idea

lay out a plastic sheet

then kill the person on it then cut him up and feed him to some hungry pigs

then just simply burn the plastic sheet
